tit.j: せいかガーデンシティ
tit.cmt: Garden City大文字にしました。

sen.j: せいかガーデンシティ（せいかがーでんしてぃ）は、京都府相楽郡精華町祝園西のJR片町線(学研都市線)祝園駅・近鉄京都線新祝園駅前にあるショッピングセンター。
sen.e: The Seika garden city, located in Hosono Nishi, Seika-cho Town, Soraku-gun County, Kyoto Prefecture, is a shopping center in front of Hosono Station on the JR Katamachi line (the science city line) and in front of Shin (new)-Hosono Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto line.

The Seika garden city, located in Hosono Nishi, Seika-cho Town, Soraku-gun County, Kyoto Prefecture, is a shopping center in front of Hosono Station on the JR Katamachi line (the science city line) and in front of Shin (new)-Hosono Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto line.

The Seika garden city, located in Hosono Nishi, Seika-cho Town, Soraku-gun County, Kyoto Prefecture, is a shopping center in front of Hosono Station on the JR Katamachi line (the science city line) and in front of Shin Hosono Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto line.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）5月16日プレオープン、同年5月18日グランドオープン。
sen.e: It opened preliminarily on May 16, 2007, and grandly on May 18, 2007.
It's preliminar opening was on May 16, 2007, and grand opening on May 18, 2007.
It's preliminary opening was on May 16, 2007, and grand opening on May 18, 2007.

sen.j: 株式会社シードが運営。
sen.e: SEED Co., Ltd. Operates the place.
SEED Co., Ltd. Operates the facility.
SEED Co., Ltd. Operates the facility.
